nodes.name: Address

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the
name.
nodes.name: symbol

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the smallest part of the token that is not divisible. This
means all token operations (creation, movement and destruction) must have
amounts that are a multiple of this number.
     * For most token contracts, this value will equal 1.
nodes.name: granularity

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the amount of tokens in existence.

nodes.documentation:
@dev See `IERC20.transfer`.
    * Unlike `send`, `recipient` is _not_ required to implement the `tokensReceived`
interface if it is a contract.
    * Also emits a `Sent` event.

nodes.documentation:
@dev See `IERC20.allowance`.
     * Note that operator and allowance concepts are orthogonal: operators may
not have allowance, and accounts with allowance may not be operators
themselves.
nodes.name: allowance

nodes.documentation:
@dev See `IERC20.approve`.
     * Note that accounts cannot have allowance issued by their operators.

nodes.documentation:
@dev See `IERC20.transferFrom`.
    * Note that operator and allowance concepts are orthogonal: operators cannot
call `transferFrom` (unless they have allowance), and accounts with
allowance cannot call `operatorSend` (unless they are operators).
    * Emits `Sent` and `Transfer` events.

arguments.value: ERC777: mint to the zero address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "ERC777: mint to the zero address"

nodes.documentation:
@dev Creates `amount` tokens and assigns them to `account`, increasing
the total supply.
     * If a send hook is registered for `raccount`, the corresponding function
will be called with `operator`, `data` and `operatorData`.
     * See `IERC777Sender` and `IERC777Recipient`.
     * Emits `Sent` and `Transfer` events.
     * Requirements
     * - `account` cannot be the zero address.
- if `account` is a contract, it must implement the `tokensReceived`
interface.
nodes.name: mintToken

nodes.documentation: Total mintableToken pending in the system
